name: Cat'tle Herdin'
description:
___________________________________

You want to take a picture with all the cats in town but they have escaped. Your objective is to gather this horde of uncontrollable felines and take a picture at the plaza with as many of them as you can.

Use your water gun to repel and guide them, they won't like your horse so you'll have to use your catnip bomb to get their attention. The clock is ticking and the cats aren't gonna gather themsleves.  What are tou waiting for?

___________________________________ Everything in this game was made during the GMTK Game jam by:
